      • addToChat

        java.lang.String addToChat(java.lang.String sender,
                         java.lang.String msg)
        Sends a message into the chat log, which is then returned to client for display. The server does the work of converting the arraylist into a string for the client.

      • getChat

        java.lang.String getChat()
        Retrieves the current chat log and turns into a string for display. This is used when the client updates the chat log, now while entering a new message.

      • joinLobby

        boolean joinLobby(java.lang.String PlayerName)
        Join a pre-created game lobby before game

      • disconnectFromLobby

        void disconnectFromLobby(java.lang.String PlayerName)
        Disconnects player from lobby so another can join.
        Parameters:
        PlayerName - - the name of the caller to be removed from party
        callback - - the callback method for success or failure.

      • getCurrentPlayers

        java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getCurrentPlayers()
        Retrieve the current players in the lobby for display in client.
        Returns:
        list of the current players
